answers.answer: If it was prednisone for inflammation, you don't want to do that often.  Too much prednisone will cause you more trouble than you have now.  ALWAYS find out the names of drugs you are given.  Getting it once won't hurt you.I warned my ex not to keep taking prednisone, but he didn't listen.  Now he has diabetes and leukemia.For the constipation, take magnesium citrate and Miralax.  You need surgrery for the fibroids, of course.
